nodes.text: TT24 holdout blaster was a make of Hold-out blaster avaliable during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During this time some agents of the Imperial Security Bureau, including supervisor Cal Alsen used a TT24 as their primary weapon. The blasters could be set to a stun setting if needed.

TT24 holdout blasters first appeared in Beyond the Rim, an adventure module written for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game by Sterling Hershey and released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
